title: 103_s1178
content: The Act may be cited as the "Great Lakes Federal Effectiveness Act" and establishes the Great Lakes Research Council. The Great Lakes Research Council is established to advise and coordinate Federal research activities for ecosystem protection in the Great Lakes. Within one year, the Council must assess research needs, Federal expertise, and capabilities to fulfill the Great Lakes Water Quality Agreement goals, and provide recommendations for both short-term and long-term actions. The Great Lakes Research Council advises on Federal research activities for ecosystem protection in the Great Lakes. It assesses research needs, recommends priorities, participates in research-related events, suggests data collection methods, helps establish a data base, and ensures timely dissemination of research findings. The Great Lakes Research Council ensures timely dissemination of research findings from Federal research programs in the Great Lakes ecosystem. The Council is comprised of research managers from various federal agencies and may include non-Federal members as ex officio members. The Chairperson of the Council is elected by its members. The Council members are entitled to compensation for travel expenses. Interagency cooperation is required to implement recommendations, with departments providing necessary personnel and facilities. The Council may provide personnel, services, or facilities upon request from the Chairperson to achieve the purposes of the Act. Data or information necessary for the Act's purposes must also be furnished upon request. The Council invites the International Joint Commission to coordinate activities and may reimburse costs. The Act does not affect the authority of Federal agencies for Great Lakes research. The Act defines key terms such as "Council" as the Great Lakes Research Council, "Great Lakes" including specific bodies of water, "Great Lakes research" as scientific application in the ecosystem, and "Great Lakes Water Quality Agreement" as a bilateral agreement between the US and Canada.
